JobFullDesc: Commvault is a worldwide leader in delivering backup and recovery for the progressive enterprise. Commvault enables you to protect, manage, and use your data, while managing it in a consistent, compliant way. Our automated solutions work on-prem and in the cloud, and work with the digital tools and procedures you’re already using. Keep your data accessible and actionable with a single solution that ensures your data is always available — no matter what.Commvault is an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are always committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. and we will not discriminate against on the basis of such characteristics or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we work.Our partners are imperative to Commvault. So it’s essential that our partner campaigns and content are clear, consistent and engaging. The Sr. Manager, Partner Marketing Campaigns is responsible for developing and deploying creative campaigns to and with our partner ecosystem. The individual will work collaboratively with the business units, alliances, corporate and regional marketing teams to define and execute high-impact campaigns to promote awareness, drive demand generation and ultimately, partner sales, both net new logos and upsell to existing customers.  This individual will leverage their extensive experience in channel and partner marketing, strong analytic skills, expertise in influencing cross functional organizations at all levels, content creation knowledge and best practices to develop measurable processes and programs. The Sr. Manager, Partner Marketing Campaigns reports to the Sr. Director, Global Partner Marketing.Position Responsibilities• Create effective partner content, collateral and demand creation campaigns or programs – using both internal and agency resources, to promote awareness, generate leads and drive new opportunities into the partner ecosystem pipeline.• Secure buy-in on campaign and program metrics, KPIs, etc. analyze and communicate status against agreed metrics, identify opportunities to improve or optimize results.• Develop and maintain an understanding of our partner ecosystem, our partner programs, and Commvault’s products and services.• Coordinate the development of global partner marketing campaign plans in a matrix organization that includes all three of Commvault’s operating theaters: the Americas, EMEA and APAC. Evangelize and enable partners and Commvault field to adopt and execute Commvault campaigns.• Facilitate and support the launch of partner campaigns.• Works collaboratively with all related groups within Commvault to ensure successful execution and launch of Partner marketing campaigns and programs, including: Field Sales and Field Marketing (by theater), Digital Marketing, Sales Operations, Corporate and Theater Communications, Partner Enablement, and others as required.Position Requirements• Significant experience (10+ years) in channel/partner marketing in an enterprise software company• Strong experience in creating and executing fully integrated marketing campaigns including creative, content, digital, social, live and virtual events and leveraging industry best practices• Excellent organizational skills and demonstrated ability to plan, coordinate and execute large projects and deadlines• Superior communication (oral and verbal) and presentation skills at all levels of the business• Strong teamwork focus and ability to work across both global as well as cross-functional organizations• Budgeting, Metrics and Dashboard creation and reporting• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience• Approximately 10% to 20% travel requiredAdditional InformationRecognized as a leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Data Centre Backup and Recovery Software, our industry’s definitive independent ranking. For the sixth straight year, Commvault has been named a leader. And this year we’re further on the “Completeness of vision” and highest on the “ability to execute”.Commvault offers its products through a broad array of distribution partner globally, while building upon its strong portfolio of strategic partnership with leading technology companies including Microsoft, Amazon web services, Cisco, Oracle, SAP, Nutanix, Pure, HP, Hitachi, NetApp & many others.
